title: Progress on Paddy Purchasing  Programme in 2011 - Yala Season as at 2011?10?12
decision_details:
- Cabinet noted the progress of the programme of purchasing paddy in the Yala Season 2011, presented by Hon. Johnston Fernando, Minister of Co-operatives and Internal Trade, giving the following details totaling to 75,172 MT. as at 2011?10?12: 
	
		*	Polonnaruwa Zone		-	         29,418  MT 
		*	Wayamba Zone		-	         	 5863  MT
		*	Ampara Zone		-	         17,976  MT
		*	Anuradhapura Zone		-		 9476 MT
		*	Southern Zone		-		 5601 MT
		*	Northern Zone		-		   860 MT
		 *	Eastern Zone			 -		  5978 MT
